name: VR Games Free for RollerCoaster Google Cardboard
name_original: VR Games Free for RollerCoaster Google Cardboard
description:
Love VR(Virtual Reality) App? Here is VR App for Roller coaster. You can try to ride Roller coaster for free!

Main Feature:
- You can have good 360 VR experience on roller coaster.
- You can ride realistic roller coaster.
- 360 View that You never seen on the normal 3D Game!

This game support for google cardboard and other VR Glass! - There is no trigger need. Just play it!

Download it right now VR Experience for FREE! Limited Time!!
